subject: DREAMWEAVER CS3 READY TO DOWNLOAD
body:
The advice that is wanted is commonly not welcome and that which is not wanted, evidently an effrontery.

Defend your limitations and you own them!

History is one of the most remarkable things in our lives. The mere fact it occurred makes it remarkable.

You can protect your liberties in this world only by protecting the other man's freedom. You can be free only if I am free.

Genius, when young, is divine.

Rigid, the skeleton of habit alone upholds the human frame.

The first step toward greatness is to be honest.

Instinct is action taken in pursuance of a purpose, but without conscious perception of what the purpose is.

'Tis a dainty thing to command, though 'twere but a flock of sheep.

If you can run one business well, you can run any business well.

Since grief only aggravates your loss, grieve not for what is past.

You are a king by your own fireside, as much as any monarch in his throne.

Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
